Test Name: Krabbe Disease, GALC Full Gene Analysis and 30 kb Deletion Detection
Purpose: To detect point mutations and large (~30 kb) deletions in the GALC gene for the diagnosis of Krabbe disease.
Equipment: DNA extraction system, PCR thermal cycler, gel electrophoresis apparatus, real-time PCR (qPCR) system, capillary electrophoresis system or next-generation sequencer
